actions.desc: The three-headed cobra makes three bite attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Bite

special_abilities.desc: The three-headed cobra gets two extra reactions that can be used only for opportunity attacks.
special_abilities.name: Reactive Heads

special_abilities.desc: The cobra has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.
special_abilities.name: Three-Headed

special_abilities.desc: While the three-headed cobra sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.
special_abilities.name: Wakeful
